name: Qkart
description: Web-based platform that allows users to search, browse, and add products to cart from various providers, providing a convenient and efficient shopping experience.

name: Tic Tac Toe Game
description: A web-based Tic Tac Toe game designed for simple, pass-and-play fun. Users can seamlessly take turns with friends, enjoying a classic game of strategy in a straightforward and accessible format.
